name: Slime Valley Adventure
description:
Travel to Slime Valley and meet friendly slimes in this visual novel adventure for a human.

Face danger and be brave as you explore the ruins of an ancient civilization and pal around with slimes.

Slime Valley is based on the web-comic of the same name.  You can check out the comic by clicking on the link below.

https://tapas.io/series/Slime-Valley/info
